contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=February 2013}} {{Infobox person | name = Eihi Shiina | image = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1976|02|03}} | birth_place = [[Fukuoka, Fukuoka|Fukuoka]], [[Japan]] | death_date = | death_place = | birth_name = | other_names = | website = | awards = }} '''Eihi Shiina''' (''Shiina Eihi'', 椎名英姫, born February 3, 1976) is a [[model (person)|fashion model]] and [[actress]] from [[Fukuoka prefecture|Fukuoka]], [[Japan]]. She got her first big break in 1995, working for [[Benetton Group|Benetton]], after which she represented Japan at the global [[Elite Model]] Look '95. More magazine work followed. Shiina made her film debut in 1999 with ''Dog-Food''. She also published a book of [[photography|photographs]] and [[poetry|poems]], entitled ''No Filter, Only Eyes'', that same year. She is recognized internationally for her role as Asami Yamazaki in [[Takashi Miike]]'s ''[[Audition (1999 film)|Audition]]''. She also starred in [[Tokyo Gore Police]] as Ruka. ==Filmography== * ''[[Open House (1998 film)|Open House]]'' (1998?) as Mitsuwa * ''[[Dog-Food]]'' (1999) * ''[[Audition (1999 film)|Audition]]'' (オーディション) (1999) as Asami Yamazaki (山崎麻美) * ''[[Eureka (2000 film)|Eureka]]'' (2000) as Keiko Kōno * ''[[Harmful Insect]]'' (害虫) (2002) * ''[[Jam Films|Jam Films 2]]: Fastener'' (2004) as an Actress * ''[[Sky High (2003 film)|Sky High]]'' (2003) (TV) as Izuko * ''[[A Day on the Planet]]'' (2004) * ''[[Tokyo Gore Police]]'' (2008) as Ruka * ''[[Vampire Girl vs. Frankenstein Girl]]'' (2009) as Monami's mother * ''[[Outrage (2010 film)|Outrage]]'' (2010) as Call Girl * ''[[Helldriver]]'' (2010) as Rikka ==External links== * {{IMDb name|id=0793402|name=Eihi Shiina}} {{JPN}} * [http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/person/p0639960.htm Shiina's JMDb Listing] ({{jp icon}}) {{Authority control|VIAF=107407288}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Shiina, Eihi | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese actor-model | DATE OF BIRTH =February 3, 1976 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[Fukuoka, Fukuoka|Fukuoka]], [[Japan]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Shiina, Eihi}} [[Category:1976 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Japanese actresses]] [[Category:People from Fukuoka Prefecture]] [[Category:Japanese female models]]
